item.title: Sample 500 Word Essay
item.description: The Importance of Effective Leadership in Modern Organizations Leadership is one of the most critical factors determining the success or failure of any organization.

item.title: Sorbonne ENGL 101 Syllabus – Academic Writing
item.description: Sorbonne ENGL 101 Syllabus Academic Writing Course Description This course develops academic writing, reading, and critical thinking skills.

item.title: Sorbonne ENGL102 Writing in the Humanities
item.description: Sorbonne ENGL 102 Writing in the Humanities Course Description This course helps military cadets improve their writing skills while learning about leadership through interesting stories, movies, and real examples.

item.title: ZMU ENGL102 The Emirates: Past, Present, Future
item.description: ZMU ENGL 102 The Emirates Past Present Future Course Description This course helps military cadets learn about the United Arab Emirates through stories, videos, and discussions.
